basics.name: Alex Barberis
basics.label: FinOps Analyst
basics.summary: Results-driven Senior FinOps Analyst-Cloud with extensive experience in cost analysis/optimization. Expert in driving cost transparency, delivering solutions, and identifying savings opportunities. Skilled in data analysis, finance, technology, and cross-functional collaboration. Proven track record of driving efficiencies, managing costs, and delivering impactful improvements.

work.summary: Operations specialist focused on Cloud Costs, Finance, Payroll and Compliance
highlights: Responsible for managing and optimizing Cloud Costs (AWS, Azure, GCP) by workload and project - used RI’s, CSP’s, credits and other tools to reduce cloud costs by 50% while increasing hours consumed by 15%
Lead the adoption of FinOps best practices across the company including monthly Cloud Costs/Spend updates to drive business-wide culture change
Extensive experience in Cloud FinOps with a strong passion for data analysis and cost analysis/optimization in large Cloud environments
Subject matter expert with the ability to speak the languages of finance, technology, and business to drive cross-functional and cross-organizational collaboration

Proven track record of identifying cost savings and optimization opportunities in partnership with application engineering teams, and establishing complete cloud infrastructure financial plans, budgets, and spend forecasts

Ability to influence with data, build models and dashboards, and provide ongoing cost transparency to drive savings and efficiencies, while managing budgets and finding creative ways to make improvements

work.position: Director of Operations and Accounts - Part Time
work.summary: Built and operate a marketing automation platform serving SMB's. Went part-time in 2021
highlights: Promoted rapidly to Director of Accounts after developing sales operations strategies, tools, systems, analytics and processes for B2B sales org; set KPI’s and organizational sales objectives and drive reporting

For marketing and sales ops, managed cross-functional project to set KPI’s based on achieved results, adjusting for incentives and opportunities for improvement, implementing further changes based on feedback loop
Trusted advisor to client C-suite. Influence leaders to adopt prescriptive best practices and drive organizational change

work.summary: Sold investments in Real Estate through AI platform
highlights: Developed ground-up sales SOP’s to increase lead conversion by 20%, work with IT to implement changes in technology infrastructure
